readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.Rainy_Day_Wizard: It's raining outside.#$e#I can practically feel the energy coming down with every drop. It's a hard feeling to describe.
content.Rainy_Night_Wizard: Oh, my. You're completely soaked.$3#$e#You should probably get out of those clothes.#$e#...$4
content.Indoor_Day_Wizard: I tried making breakfast this morning. [194 210]#$e#It's nothing intricate, but it's edible.$4
content.Indoor_Night_Wizard: My day was quite frustrating...$s#$e#But tell me about yours. I'm sure it was much more productive than mine.$7
content.summer_Wizard: The changing of seasons is rather trivial in the grand scheme of things.#$e#That being said, the summer heat is an atrocity...
content.fall_Wizard: Is summer usually this cool?#$e#What? It's fall already...?#$e#Maybe I should take a walk every once in a while...
content.winter_Wizard: I think it snowed last night.
content.Rainy_Day_0: It's raining outside.#$e#I can practically feel the energy coming down with every drop. It's a hard feeling to describe.
content.Rainy_Day_1: Ah, rain...#$e#I plan to do some complex rituals today.$7
content.Rainy_Night_0: I had a very productive day.$7#$e#What did you do today?$9
content.Rainy_Night_3: The house is so quiet when you're out doing your work.#$e#Somehow, it's even more so when it's raining.#$e#I'm glad you're home.$9
content.Rainy_Night_4: I find it much easier to fall asleep with the sound of rain as a backdrop.
content.Indoor_Day_0: I may have discovered a new sort of elemental.#$e#I'll be quite busy today.
content.Indoor_Day_1: I've let the house get too messy.$s#$e#I'll clean it today. You don't have to worry about it.
content.Indoor_Day_4: Here, try this. [195]$7#$e#I think I'm getting a little better at cooking.$7#$e#No, it's not a magical omelette...$4
content.Indoor_Night_1: I cleaned up the house today.$9
content.Indoor_Night_3: I made dinner! No magic this time, I promise. [218 730 649]$7#$e#I hope you like it.$9
content.Indoor_Night_4: My day was quite frustrating...$s#$e#But tell me about yours. I'm sure it was much more productive than mine.$7
content.Good_0: I thought I was truly meant to be alone until I met you, @. I didn't know two people could love and support each other so well.$7
content.Good_2: I know I don't express it well, but I love you, @.$4#$e#You mean the world to me.$6
content.Good_3: Stay safe. There are many wonders beyond the farm, but promise me you'll always make it back home.$9
content.Good_4: Thank you for always eating my cooking... Even though it isn't the best.
content.Good_5: I'm the Witch, but you've truly got me under your spell.$7#$e#...That was awful. My apologies.$4
content.Neutral_0: I sensed my ex-wife's presence the other night and I awoke in the morning with a terrible headache...$s
content.Neutral_1: What are your plans for the day?
content.Neutral_2: How is the farm doing financially?#$e#If we're ever in trouble, I will assist however I can. My own work can wait.
content.Neutral_3: Cooking can be both a frustrating and rewarding activity.$s
content.Neutral_4: The valley is a wonderful place to study magic.
content.Bad_1: You hardly ever speak to me anymore. It's like I still live alone in my tower.$s
content.Bad_3: I already have an ex-wife. Keep up your behavior and I'll have an ex-husband, too.$5^I already have an ex-wife. Keep up your behavior and I'll have two.$5
content.Bad_4: You're an awful person, just like the rest of this forsaken town.$5
content.funLeave_Wizard: I have some business to attend to today.#$e#Don't mind me... I'll be back soon enough.$9
content.funReturn_Wizard: It's quite strange... my tower hasn't changed one bit, but it feels so empty there now.$8#$e#I was so accustomed to being alone, but now I can't wait to get back home and see you.$6
content.spring_1: A new year... Let's hope it is bountiful for both of us.
content.spring_12: I understand not the purpose of tomorrow's festival.#$e#It seems to be a terrible waste of eggs...$s#$e#Though I will go if you do.
content.spring_23: The thought of dancing in front of the entire town is highly unpleasant.#$e#But I will endure it... only for you.$4
content.summer_1: I find it hard to concentrate in the intense summer heat...#$e#Perhaps I can conjure some sort of air conditioner.$3
content.summer_10: There's no telling what would happen if you put a magical item in tomorrow's soup.$3#$e#...I recommend you do not do that.
content.summer_27: I find watching the moon jellies to be quite relaxing.#$e#Let us enjoy it together.$6
content.fall_1: Fall is my favorite season. I can practically smell the magic in the air, flowing around us like a breeze.$9
content.fall_15: The fair is quite popular, isn't it?#$e#I prefer to avoid large crowds... but I am more than willing to go, if only to spend time with you.$9
content.fall_26: I quite enjoy tomorrow's festivities. I actually have a hand in setting it all up, believe it or not.#$e#I hope the maze isn't too scary for you.$7
content.winter_1: The snow has a quiet, romantic feel, doesn't it?#$e#Do try and stay warm... I'll help however I can.$6
content.winter_7: I would offer my magical assistance for the competition tomorrow, but I know you won't need it.#$e#...Do let me know if you want my help, though.$7
content.winter_24: Tomorrow's festivities seem rather pointless.#$e#Most earthly posessions are not worth going to any trouble for.
content.spouseRoom_Wizard: #$c .5#Hm... Three and four... Four and five...#$e#No, no, that's not it...$5#$e#Where did I leave that book...?$5
